Package es.codeurjc.services

Class CartService

java.lang.Object
es.codeurjc.services.CartService
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
@Service public class CartService extends Object implements Serializable
Service that manage all mapping about CartService specially used in cart functions like add and show
Version:
1.4
Author:
gu4re
See Also:

    Field

    private static Map<Shoes,Integer>
    shoesMap
    Fake database that controls the shoes inside cart in the App and maps the name of the product (Key) with a Java Object called Shoes that contains all info about it (Value)

  • Method Details

    • run

      @EventListener @Deprecated(since="1.3") public static void run(org.springframework.context.event.ContextRefreshedEvent event)
      Deprecated.
      This method can only be used by SpringBeanSystem so abstain from using it
      Starts the CartService creating the database of the Service.

    • stop

      @Deprecated(since="1.3") @EventListener public static void stop(org.springframework.context.event.ContextClosedEvent event)
      Deprecated.
      This method can only be used by SpringBeanSystem so abstain from using it
      Stops the CartService before the Spring Application ends, clearing the shoes database

    • maxQuantity

      public static boolean maxQuantity(String name, float price, int size)
      Check if a pair of shoes exceeds the maximum of quantity inside cart
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the pair of shoes
      price - the price of the pair of shoes
      size - the size of the pair of shoes
      Returns:
      True if the pair of shoes exists otherwise False

    • addToCart

      public static void addToCart(String name, float price, int size)
      Adds the Shoes object passed through different args to the cart database
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the pair of shoes
      price - the price of the pair of shoes
      size - the size of the pair of shoes

    • export

      @NotNull public static @NotNull org.json.JSONArray export() throws UnsupportedExportException
      Export the database in JSONArray form to give it to the frontend
      Returns:
      the Shoes database in JSONArray format
      Throws:
      UnsupportedExportException - if it was unable to convert the database to JSONArray

      public static void clear()
      Allows us to clear the cart
